Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value in its category. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
